mapper.select: SELECT CONCAT('GPU', (SELECT LPAD(NVL(MAX(SUBSTR(TRIM(id), 4)), 0)+1, 6, '0') FROM parts_gpu)) AS id FROM DUAL

SELECT a.id AS id , a.parts_name AS partsName , a.parts_price AS partsPrice , a.gled_cd AS gledCd , (SELECT nm FROM comn_cd_detail WHERE comn_cd = 'COM002' AND cd = a.gled_cd) AS gledCdNm , a.gn AS gn , a.gmc_cd AS gmcCd , (SELECT nm FROM comn_cd_detail WHERE comn_cd = 'PRT001' AND cd = a.gmc_cd) AS gmcCdNm , a.gsc_cd AS gscCd , (SELECT nm FROM comn_cd_detail WHERE comn_cd = 'PRT002' AND cd = a.gsc_cd) AS gscCdNm , a.gsv AS gsv , a.gpuas_cd AS gpuasCd , (SELECT nm FROM comn_cd_detail WHERE comn_cd = 'PRT003' AND cd = a.gpuas_cd) AS gpuasCdNm , a.qc AS qc , a.tdp AS tdp , a.bn AS bn , a.il AS il , a.gpl AS gpl , a.twelve_pin AS twelvePin , a.parts_image AS partsImage , a.reg_dtm AS regDtm , a.updt_dtm AS updtDtm FROM parts_gpu a;
